Name: TrainingEpisode
Description: A container for a training exercise involving the same network and the same dataset.

Properties.Name: name
Properties.Description: The name of the trainingEpisode. This is used for exporting and therefor should be unique.

Properties.Name: useWandB
Properties.Description: Indicates wether weights and biases logging will be used.

Properties.Name: crossValErrorHistory
Properties.Description: History of the cross validation error. Consists of dicts containing iteration and error.
